title: My account was permanently suspended
body: I just play a Normal game in the morning then when I open LOL at night. It shows me my account was permanently suspended. But i never use script before. I even don't know what's that. Hope Riot could give me a reason.

replies.body:
Were you toxic?
probably got boosted
probably got reported for random reasons
but luck, i have lost 3 accs without any claer reason. register another acc.

Send a support ticket to riot, this is an issue that has happened to quite a few people and they normally resolve it, you may have to respond to automated msgs a few times prior to receiving some actual help though.

I  have  sent  a  email  to riot but he back me 
Your account has been permanently suspended following the use of scripts, hacks, exploits or unauthorized third-party programs in League of Legends. Accounts that are caught using hacks to gain an unfair competitive advantage are subject to permanent suspension. We work hard to preserve a fair and competitive environment in League of Legends. Regardless of intent, use of unauthorized third-party programs is explicitly against the Terms of Use, which can be found here:

OCE: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse

Keep in mind that account sharing of any kind is also against the Terms of Use. You are responsible for all activity on your account, so be sure to keep your account information to yourself.

We won't be able to go into the specifics of an account's exploit abuse, as divulging this information could compromise future investigations. Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.

KramSyhr 
Player Support Specialist 
Prefer Support

what's that meaning
Thats an automated msg, just repeat the issue to them and wait for another reply, hopefully you wont get another automated and they will actually help you.
My account ID is Sharow u can check in op.gg I don't a person that he use script then he lost lots of rank.
